DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study elucidate role Endothelium-Derived Hyperpolarizing Factor ( EDHF ) play dilate blood vessel whether differs healthy people high cholesterol . A second purpose study determine identity EDHF .
DOC.detailed_description: The vascular endothelium synthesize least four potent vasodilator substance : nitric oxide ( NO ) , prostacyclin , carbon monoxide endothelium-derived hyperpolarizing factor ( EDHF ) contribute vasodilator tone , inhibition platelet activation inflammation . EDHF release stimulate receptor-dependent agonist acetylcholine bradykinin ( BK ) , lead hyperpolarization underlie smooth muscle cell presumably open Ca2+-activated K+ channel . Indirect pharmacological evidence suggest EDHF cytochrome P450-derived arachidonic acid metabolite , presumably epoxide . Although pivotal role NO conduit vessel dilation response acute increase shear stress well know , ' contribution dilation sustain increase flow minimal , may due EDHF release .
DOC.criteria: Hyperlipidemic ( LDL > 140 ) Healthy Volunteer Pregnancy Diabetes mellitus Cardiovascular Disease Hypertension Use regular medication Renal insufficiency Smoking ( current within past 5 year ) Bleeding disorder
